function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Potential lack of standardised data collection methods","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of local support for legal and informatics aspects","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of common standards in health data across member states","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Stringent local legal and ethical requirements hindering timely research in public health threats","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of coordination and harmonization in covid-19 patient cohorts","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sensitive participant-level clinical data usage and privacy concerns","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of interoperability between community-developed data standards","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Classical format of research funding is slow and may not generate evidence and knowledge fast enough in dynamic situations like a pandemic.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Competitive nature of funding calls overlooks certain eu regions, leading to limited participation from those areas.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Knowledge scouting activities are not included, leading to delayed evidence production and limited confirmation of scientific importance.","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risk of data breaches in centralised data repositories leading to unauthorized access and use of sensitive information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of privacy breaches and data misuse in federated data analysis and machine learning due to lack of standardized security measures across local nodes.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ethical considerations in accessing patient records","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardized reporting for cohort data and international code linkage","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inability to untangle the complexities of multi-factorial pathways through which planning impacts urban health","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of research on the impact of vr and ar technologies on disease propagation in educational settings.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of guidelines for safe implementation of vr and ar technologies in public places for security and patrol purposes.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Dependency on ai/ml/dl for critical healthcare decisions leading to potential errors or biases.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on 5g for remote healthcare services leading to potential data security and privacy risks.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of iot devices for tracking and surveillance may raise privacy concerns for individuals being monitored.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on iot devices for early diagnosis may lead to inaccurate results and mismanagement of covid-19 cases.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of standardization and regulation in the use of iot devices for pandemic management may result in inconsistent data collection and analysis.","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Focus on covid-19 and digital technologies may overlook other contagious diseases that pose a risk to public health.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rear extensions do not allow for a ready installation of a containment space without sacrificing room functionality or garden space.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Conversion of a front room into a containment space places the containment space in the heart of the sleeping quarters.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Recent homes with double garages at the front may require the owner to forgo a car parking space in order to insert a containment room module.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High density housing and communal spaces can lead to a concentration of residents and increased flow of people, which can contribute to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spatial separation and narrow corridors can create bottlenecks and bottlenecks that increase the likelihood of close contact and the spread of pathogens between individuals passing through the area.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shared access points and common bottlenecks in apartment buildings make them vulnerable to becoming hotspots for contagious diseases, leading to rapid transmission among residents.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate airflow and ventilation in the built environment leading to the potential spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to open air spaces leading to confinement-related mental health issues in isolated occupants.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to observe social distancing guidelines in communal spaces, leading to potential transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Socialising in residential spaces may expose occupants to pathogens carried by visitors, including asymptomatic individuals with covid-19.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of green features in the home environment may lead to a decline in psychological health during covid-19 lockdown.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access to public green spaces during the covid-19 pandemic may impact psychological health.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate interaction with green elements in the workplace may affect psychological health, especially for non-smart workers.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Association between indoor-outdoor green features and psychological health outcomes adjusted for covid-19 cases.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effects of lockdown on individuals’ perception and behavioral adjustment.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differential effects of indoor and outdoor green features on psychological health outcomes.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interaction of current working mode and green view affecting psychological health outcomes.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete or unclear data on the prevalence of psychological health outcomes.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential bias in the study participants’ reporting of psychological health outcomes.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of misinterpretation of the descriptive statistics of psychological health outcomes.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effect of home confinement on psychological health outcomes.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inconsistent results in literature regarding the association between indoor plants and anxiety.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High prevalence of covid-19 pandemic among respondents.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of psychological health outcomes such as anxiety, irritability, and sleep disturbance.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The presence of confirmed covid-19 cases per regional population as a potential confounding variable in the analysis.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The high number of positive covid-19 cases in certain regions in relation to the total population.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
